data.name: Mirror: Enchanting Reflections
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains 48 CGs that were never shown in the game. 4 more CGs for each girl and combined with the CGs in-game will draw you an enchanting picture you've never experienced before.

After purchasing, you can enter Gallery in-game to enjoy all the CGs or find the pictures in dlc_Easter Eggs. All the picture are in ultra-high resolution.

♡Mirror: Enchanting Reflections Release Promotion♡

[h1] Please read this announcement carefully before you decide to participate.[/h1]

♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡
[h1]♡ Rules&Limitations♡: [/h1]
1. Please set 'My profile' and 'Game Details' public in your Steam Profile, and please DO NOT click the box of "Always keep my total playtime private even if users can see my game details”.
2. If you have participated, are participating or will participate any our Events/Promotions (including but not limited to Events/Promotions before, ongoing Events/Promotions and future Events/Promotions) and have applied for a refund for any of our titles (including but not limited to games and DLCs), you will lose the privilege of participating any of our Event/Promotion PERMANENTLY, and will NOT receive any gift.
3. During the Event, each Steam account has one chance to participate. Any malicious intent (including but not limited to massive registration, using any script or third-party software, violating Steam Guidelines, purchasing with stolen credit cards, malicious refunding, refreshing, hacking and false information) will be treated as hostile and will result in getting banned PERMANENTLY from our Events/Promotions.
4. To participate, you need to purchase Mirror: Enchanting Reflections on Steam before 9:00 Jan 25, 2019(UTC/GMT+8) and playtime of Mirror should each be more than 6 hours.
You’ll be assigned a random number from 0 to 99999. The promotion page will be closed [h1]at 9:00 Jan 25, 2019(UTC/GMT+8). [/h1].
5. Gift: ’PlayStation4’. You’ll need to fill in the info form on the promotion page and SELECT IT before the deadline, WE DO NOT RETAIN RESPONSIBILITY FOR UNRECEIVED GIFTS IF THE ADDRESS PROVIDED IS WRONG OR BLANK.
6. [h1]7 hours after the promotion ends, [/h1]we’ll announce 1 lucky gamers generated randomly by our program on the same website as the promotion page. Please fill in the address form in the page and also SELECT IT [h1]within 96 hours after we announce the lucky gamers, WE DO NOT RETAIN RESPONSIBILITY FOR UNRECEIVED GIFTS IF THE ADDRESS PROVIDED IS WRONG OR BLANK. [/h1]
7. The gifts will be sent to the address you provided within 60 business days after the promotion ends. If we have trouble shipping it to you, we’ll send email. If there’s any question, please email. Thanks for understanding.
8. According to Tax Laws, the receiving gamer shall bear all expense of taxation arising from the gift.
9. If you feel wrongfully accused, please leave a message for appeal.
10. Final interpretation of this event belongs to us. .
11. Link: http://promotion.paradise.games/s/mirror-enchanting-reflections

♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡

If you’ve encountered any problem, please leave a message.

data.short_description: This DLC contains 48 CGs that were never shown in the game. 4 more CGs for each girl and combined with the CGs in-game will draw you an enchanting picture you've never experienced before.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or Later
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
